product_name: Shimano SH-WM51 Off-Road Bike Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Up your off-road pedaling efficiency with the women's Shimano SH-WM51 Off-Road Bike Shoes. The women-specific fit ensures a natural, comfortable ride for your feet. Tough, stretch-resistant synthetic leather and mesh uppers cradle the feet snugly. Low-profile, triple off-set straps prevent uncomfortable pressure on foot and make the roughest terrain smooth pedaling. Polyurethane lugs are optimally placed with the arch pads to deliver pedal stability. Nylon soles on the women's Shimano SH-WM51 Off-Road Bike Shoes are reinforced with glass fibers to increase stiffness and power transfer. Closeout.
short_description: Up your off-road pedaling efficiency with the women's Shimano SH-WM51 Off-Road Bike Shoes. The women-specific fit ensures a natural, comfortable ride for your feet.
